content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 33, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a red_sandstone, I need to place 4 red_sand in a 2x2 pattern in the crafting grid. I will first move one red_sand from slot 23 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 33, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 44}]
thought: I will now move a red_sand from slot 23 to slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 33, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 44}]
thought: I will now move a red_sand from slot 23 to slot 4, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 33, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 44}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last red_sand from slot 23 to slot 5, which is adjacent to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 33, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the red_sandstone, I will move it from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 33, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a smooth_red_sandstone, I need to smelt the red_sandstone at slot 11 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 12 with quantity 1
